channel.title: Only read if you enjoy helping nubs
channel.description: ok im trying to make an autominer, how do i make it continuously mine the type of ore i specify? and then drop it? (RUNESCAPE 2 fyi)

item.title: Only read if you enjoy helping nubs
item.dc:creator: @oblivian oblivian
item.description:
@oblivian wrote:

umm just put this as ur main loop(exept fill it in with real procedures)

begin
loadbitmaps;
repeat
minerock;(fill this in with ur procedure)
droprock;(fill this in with ur procedure)
until false;
end.

or just include SRL and theirs a manual that explains it all.
their is a procedure that does that in SRL.

Read full topic
item.source: Only read if you enjoy helping nubs

item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

use includes such as Squig2 or SRL.

They both have procedures that will drop all the ore you need, as well as better mouse movements so it wont get banned [as quickly]
